00062 Master::Master(PropertiesPtr &props, ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr,
00063                ApplicationQueuePtr &app_queue)
00064   : m_props_ptr(props), m_conn_manager_ptr(conn_mgr),
00065     m_app_queue_ptr(app_queue), m_verbose(false), m_dfs_client(0),
00066     m_initialized(false) {
00067 
00068   m_server_map_iter = m_server_map.begin();
00069 
00070   m_hyperspace_ptr = new Hyperspace::Session(conn_mgr->get_comm(), props,
00071                                              &m_hyperspace_session_handler);
00072   uint32_t timeout = props->get_i32("Hyperspace.Timeout");
00073 
00074   if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->wait_for_connection(timeout)) {
00075     HT_ERROR("Unable to connect to hyperspace, exiting...");
00076     exit(1);
00077   }
00078 
00079   m_verbose = props->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose");
00080   uint16_t port = props->get_i16("Hypertable.Master.Port");
00081   m_max_range_bytes = props->get_i64("Hypertable.RangeServer.Range.MaxBytes");
00082 
00086   DfsBroker::Client *dfs_client = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_mgr, props);
00087   timeout = props->get_i32("DfsBroker.Timeout");
00088 
00089   if (!dfs_client->wait_for_connection(timeout)) {
00090     HT_ERROR("Unable to connect to DFS Broker, exiting...");
00091     exit(1);
00092   }
00093   m_dfs_client = dfs_client;
00094 
00095   atomic_set(&m_last_table_id, 0);
00096 
00097   if (!initialize())
00098     exit(1);
00099 
00100   /* Read Last Table ID */
00101   {
00102     DynamicBuffer valbuf(0);
00103     HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00104     int ival;
00105     uint32_t lock_status;
00106     uint32_t oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00107 
00108     m_master_file_handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/master", oflags,
00109                                                   null_handle_callback);
00110 
00111     m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(m_master_file_handle, LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE,
00112                                &lock_status, &m_master_file_sequencer);
00113 
00114     if (lock_status != LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00115       HT_ERROR("Unable to obtain lock on '/hypertable/master' - conflict");
00116       exit(1);
00117     }
00118 
00119     // Write master location in 'address' attribute, format is IP:port
00120     InetAddr addr(System::net_info().primary_addr, port);
00121     String addr_s = addr.format();
00122     m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "address",
00123                                addr_s.c_str(), addr_s.length());
00124 
00125     try {
00126       m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id", valbuf);
00127       ival = atoi((const char *)valbuf.base);
00128     }
00129     catch (Exception &e) {
00130       if (e.code() == Error::HYPERSPACE_ATTR_NOT_FOUND) {
00131         m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id", "0",
00132                                    2);
00133         ival = 0;
00134       }
00135       else
00136         HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, e.what());
00137     }
00138 
00139     atomic_set(&m_last_table_id, ival);
00140     if (m_verbose)
00141       cout << "Last Table ID: " << ival << endl;
00142   }
00143 
00147   scan_servers_directory();
00148 
00149   master_gc_start(props, m_threads, m_metadata_table_ptr, m_dfs_client);
00150 }

00173 void Master::server_left(const String &location) {
00174   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00175   uint32_t lock_status;
00176   LockSequencer lock_sequencer;
00177   ServerMap::iterator iter = m_server_map.find(location);
00178   String hsfname = (String)"/hypertable/servers/" + location;
00179 
00180   HT_INFOF("Server left: %s", location.c_str());
00181 
00182   if (iter == m_server_map.end()) {
00183     HT_WARNF("Server (%s) not found in map", location.c_str());
00184     return;
00185   }
00186 
00187   // if we're about to delete the item pointing to the server map iterator,
00188   // then advance the iterator
00189   if (iter == m_server_map_iter)
00190     ++m_server_map_iter;
00191 
00192   m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock((*iter).second->hyperspace_handle,
00193       LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lock_status, &lock_sequencer);
00194 
00195   if (lock_status != LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00196     HT_INFOF("Unable to obtain lock on server file %s, ignoring...",
00197              location.c_str());
00198     m_server_map.erase(iter);
00199     return;
00200   }
00201 
00202   try {
00203     m_hyperspace_ptr->close((*iter).second->hyperspace_handle);
00204     m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(hsfname);
00205   }
00206   catch (Exception &e) {
00207     HT_WARN_OUT "Problem closing file '" << hsfname << "' - " << e << HT_END;
00208   }
00209 
00210   m_server_map.erase(iter);
00211   if (m_server_map.empty())
00212     m_no_servers_cond.notify_all();
00213 
00214   HT_INFOF("RangeServer lost it's lock on file %s, deleting ...",
00215            hsfname.c_str());
00216   cout << flush;
00217 
00221 }

00228 void
00229 Master::create_table(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *tablename,
00230                      const char *schemastr) {
00231 
00232   HT_INFOF("Create table: %s", tablename);
00233 
00234   wait_for_initialization();
00235 
00236   try {
00237     create_table(tablename, schemastr);
00238   }
00239   catch (Exception &e) {
00240     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00241     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00242     return;
00243   }
00244 
00245   cb->response_ok();
00246 }

00252 void Master::get_schema(ResponseCallbackGetSchema *cb, const char *tablename) {
00253   String tablefile = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + tablename;
00254   String errmsg;
00255   DynamicBuffer schemabuf(0);
00256   uint64_t handle;
00257   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00258 
00259   HT_INFOF("Get schema: %s", tablename);
00260 
00261   wait_for_initialization();
00262 
00263   try {
00264 
00268     if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->exists(tablefile)) {
00269       cb->error(Error::TABLE_NOT_FOUND, tablename);
00270       return;
00271     }
00272 
00276     handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(tablefile, OPEN_FLAG_READ,
00277                                     null_handle_callback);
00278 
00282     m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "schema", schemabuf);
00283 
00284     m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00285 
00286     cb->response((char *)schemabuf.base);
00287 
00288     if (m_verbose) {
00289       HT_INFOF("Successfully fetched schema (length=%d) for table '%s'",
00290                (int)strlen((char *)schemabuf.base), tablename);
00291     }
00292 
00293   }
00294   catch (Exception &e) {
00295     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00296     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00297   }
00298 }

00305 void
00306 Master::register_server(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *location,
00307                         const sockaddr_in &addr) {
00308   RangeServerStatePtr rs_state;
00309   ServerMap::iterator iter;
00310   struct sockaddr_in alias;
00311   uint32_t oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00312   HandleCallbackPtr lock_file_handler;
00313   uint32_t lock_status;
00314   LockSequencer lock_sequencer;
00315   String hsfname;
00316   bool exists = false;
00317 
00318   HT_INFOF("Register server: %s", location);
00319 
00320   try {
00321     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00322 
00323     if((iter = m_server_map.find(location)) != m_server_map.end()) {
00324       HT_ERRORF("Rangeserver with location = %s already registered", location);
00325       cb->error(Error::MASTER_RANGESERVER_ALREADY_REGISTERED, (String) 
00326           "Rangeserver with location " +location+ 
00327           " already registered with master");
00328       return;
00329     }
00330 
00331     rs_state = new RangeServerState();
00332     rs_state->location = location;
00333     rs_state->addr = addr;
00334 
00335     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(location, alias)) {
00336       HT_ERRORF("Problem creating address from location '%s'", location);
00337       cb->error(Error::INVALID_METADATA, (String)"Unable to convert location '"
00338                 + location + "' to address");
00339       return;
00340     }
00341     else {
00342       Comm *comm = m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm();
00343       comm->set_alias(addr, alias);
00344     }
00345 
00346     hsfname = (String)"/hypertable/servers/" + location;
00347 
00348     lock_file_handler =
00349         new ServerLockFileHandler(rs_state, this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00350 
00351     rs_state->hyperspace_handle =
00352         m_hyperspace_ptr->open(hsfname, oflags, lock_file_handler);
00353 
00354     m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(rs_state->hyperspace_handle,
00355         LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lock_status, &lock_sequencer);
00356 
00357     if (lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00358       HT_INFOF("Obtained lock on servers file %s, removing...",
00359                hsfname.c_str());
00360       m_hyperspace_ptr->release(rs_state->hyperspace_handle);
00361       m_hyperspace_ptr->close(rs_state->hyperspace_handle);
00362       m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(hsfname);
00363       cb->error(Error::MASTER_FILE_NOT_LOCKED, format("Server file '%s' "
00364                 "not locked", hsfname.c_str()));
00365       return;
00366     }
00367     else
00368       m_server_map[rs_state->location] = rs_state;
00369 
00370     HT_INFOF("Server Registered %s -> %s", location,
00371              InetAddr::format(addr).c_str());
00372 
00373     cb->response_ok();
00374 
00375   }
00376   catch (Exception &e) {
00377     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00378     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00379     return;
00380   }
00381 
00385   {
00386     ScopedLock init_lock(m_initialization_mutex);
00387     
00388     if (!m_initialized) {
00389       TableIdentifier table;
00390       RangeSpec range;
00391       RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30000);
00392 
00393       HT_INFO("Initializing METADATA");
00394 
00398       {
00399         String metadata_schema_file = System::install_dir + "/conf/METADATA.xml";
00400         off_t schemalen;
00401         const char *schemastr =
00402           FileUtils::file_to_buffer(metadata_schema_file.c_str(), &schemalen);
00403 
00404         try {
00405           create_table("METADATA", schemastr);
00406         }
00407         catch (Exception &e) {
00408           if (e.code() != Error::MASTER_TABLE_EXISTS) {
00409             HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00410             HT_ABORT;
00411           }
00412           exists = true;
00413         }
00414       }
00415 
00419       m_metadata_table_ptr = new Table(m_props_ptr,
00420                                        m_conn_manager_ptr, m_hyperspace_ptr, "METADATA");
00421 
00422       // If table exists, then ranges should already have been assigned
00423       if (exists) {
00424         m_initialized = true;
00425         m_initialization_cond.notify_all();
00426         HT_INFO("METADATA table already exists");
00427         return;
00428       }
00429 
00430       m_metadata_table_ptr->get_identifier(&table);
00431       table.name = "METADATA";
00432 
00436       range.start_row = 0;
00437       range.end_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00438 
00439       try {
00440         RangeState range_state;
00441         range_state.soft_limit = m_max_range_bytes;
00442         rsc.load_range(alias, table, range, 0, range_state);
00443       }
00444       catch (Exception &e) {
00445         HT_ERRORF("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[..%s] at server "
00446                   "%s - %s", table.name, range.end_row,
00447                   InetAddr::format(alias).c_str(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00448       }
00449 
00450 
00455       TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00456       KeySpec key;
00457       String metadata_key_str;
00458 
00459       mutator_ptr = m_metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00460 
00461       metadata_key_str = String("0:") + Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00462       key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00463       key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00464       key.column_qualifier = 0;
00465       key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00466 
00467       try {
00468         key.column_family = "StartRow";
00469         mutator_ptr->set(key, (uint8_t *)Key::END_ROOT_ROW,
00470                          strlen(Key::END_ROOT_ROW));
00471         mutator_ptr->flush();
00472       }
00473       catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00474         // TODO: propagate exception
00475         HT_ERRORF("METADATA update error (row_key = %s) - %s : %s",
00476                   metadata_key_str.c_str(), e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00477         exit(1);
00478       }
00479 
00483       range.start_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00484       range.end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00485 
00486       try {
00487         RangeState range_state;
00488         range_state.soft_limit = m_max_range_bytes;
00489         rsc.load_range(alias, table, range, 0, range_state);
00490       }
00491       catch (Exception &e) {
00492         HT_ERRORF("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[..%s] at server "
00493                   "%s - %s", table.name, range.end_row,
00494                   InetAddr::format(alias).c_str(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00495       }
00496 
00497       HT_INFO("METADATA table successfully initialized");
00498 
00499       m_initialized = true;
00500       m_initialization_cond.notify_all();
00501     }
00502   }
00503 
00504 }
00505 
00512 void
00513 Master::report_split(ResponseCallback *cb, const TableIdentifier &table,
00514     const RangeSpec &range, const char *transfer_log_dir, uint64_t soft_limit) {
00515   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00516   RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30000);
00517 
00518   HT_INFOF("Entering report_split for %s[%s:%s].", table.name, range.start_row,
00519            range.end_row);
00520 
00521   wait_for_initialization();
00522 
00523   {
00524     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00525     if (m_server_map_iter == m_server_map.end())
00526       m_server_map_iter = m_server_map.begin();
00527     assert(m_server_map_iter != m_server_map.end());
00528     memcpy(&addr, &((*m_server_map_iter).second->addr),
00529            sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00530     HT_INFOF("Assigning newly reported range %s[%s:%s] to %s", table.name,
00531              range.start_row, range.end_row,
00532              (*m_server_map_iter).first.c_str());
00533     ++m_server_map_iter;
00534   }
00535 
00536   //cb->get_address(addr);
00537 
00538   try {
00539     RangeState range_state;
00540     range_state.soft_limit = soft_limit;
00541     rsc.load_range(addr, table, range, transfer_log_dir, range_state);
00542     HT_INFOF("report_split for %s[%s:%s] successful.", table.name,
00543              range.start_row, range.end_row);
00544   }
00545   catch (Exception &e) {
00546     HT_ERRORF("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[%s:%s] at server "
00547               "%s - %s", table.name, range.start_row, range.end_row,
00548               InetAddr::format(addr).c_str(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00549     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00550   }
00551 
00552   cb->response_ok();
00553 
00554 }
00555 
00556 void
00557 Master::drop_table(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *table_name,
00558                    bool if_exists) {
00559   int saved_error = Error::OK;
00560   String err_msg;
00561   String table_file = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + table_name;
00562   DynamicBuffer value_buf(0);
00563   int ival;
00564   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00565   uint64_t handle;
00566   String table_name_str = table_name;
00567 
00568   HT_INFOF("Entering drop_table for %s", table_name);
00569 
00570   wait_for_initialization();
00571 
00572   try {
00573 
00577     try {
00578       handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(table_file.c_str(), OPEN_FLAG_READ,
00579                                       null_handle_callback);
00580     }
00581     catch (Exception &e) {
00582       if (if_exists && e.code() == Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME) {
00583         cb->response_ok();
00584         return;
00585       }
00586       HT_THROW2F(e.code(), e, "Problem opening file '%s'", table_file.c_str());
00587     }
00588 
00589     m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "table_id", value_buf);
00590 
00591     m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00592 
00593     ival = atoi((const char *)value_buf.base);
00594 
00595     {
00596       char start_row[16];
00597       char end_row[16];
00598       TableScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00599       ScanSpec scan_spec;
00600       Cell cell;
00601       String location_str;
00602       std::set<String> unique_locations;
00603       TableIdentifier table;
00604       RowInterval ri;
00605 
00606       table.name = table_name_str.c_str();
00607       table.id = ival;
00608       table.generation = 0;
00609 
00610       sprintf(start_row, "%d:", ival);
00611       sprintf(end_row, "%d:%s", ival, Key::END_ROW_MARKER);
00612 
00613       scan_spec.row_limit = 0;
00614       scan_spec.max_versions = 1;
00615       scan_spec.columns.clear();
00616       scan_spec.columns.push_back("Location");
00617 
00618       ri.start = start_row;
00619       ri.end = end_row;
00620       scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00621 
00622       int max_wait=5;
00623 
00624       while (!m_metadata_table_ptr && max_wait) {
00625         poll(0, 0, 1000);
00626         max_wait--;
00627       }
00628 
00629       if (!m_metadata_table_ptr)
00630         HT_THROW(Error::MASTER_NO_RANGESERVERS,
00631                  "Aborting DropTable because no RangeServers have registered");
00632 
00633       scanner_ptr = m_metadata_table_ptr->create_scanner(scan_spec);
00634 
00635       while (scanner_ptr->next(cell)) {
00636         location_str = String((const char *)cell.value, cell.value_len);
00637         boost::trim(location_str);
00638         if (location_str != "" && location_str != "!")
00639           unique_locations.insert(location_str);
00640       }
00641 
00642       if (!unique_locations.empty()) {
00643         DropTableDispatchHandler sync_handler(table,
00644             m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30000);
00645         RangeServerStatePtr state_ptr;
00646         ServerMap::iterator iter;
00647 
00648         {
00649           ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00650           for (std::set<String>::iterator loc_iter = unique_locations.begin();
00651                loc_iter != unique_locations.end(); ++loc_iter) {
00652             if ((iter = m_server_map.find(*loc_iter)) != m_server_map.end()) {
00653               sync_handler.add((*iter).second->addr);
00654             }
00655             else {
00656               saved_error = Error::RANGESERVER_UNAVAILABLE;
00657               err_msg = *loc_iter;
00658             }
00659           }
00660         }
00661 
00662         if (!sync_handler.wait_for_completion()) {
00663           std::vector<DropTableDispatchHandler::ErrorResult> errors;
00664           sync_handler.get_errors(errors);
00665           for (size_t i=0; i<errors.size(); i++) {
00666             HT_WARNF("drop table error - %s - %s", errors[i].msg.c_str(),
00667                      Error::get_text(errors[i].error));
00668           }
00669           cb->error(errors[0].error, errors[0].msg);
00670           return;
00671         }
00672       }
00673 
00674     }
00675 
00676     if (saved_error != Error::OK) {
00677       HT_ERRORF("DROP TABLE failed '%s' - %s", err_msg.c_str(),
00678                 Error::get_text(saved_error));
00679       cb->error(saved_error, err_msg);
00680       return;
00681     }
00682     else {
00683       m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(table_file.c_str());
00684     }
00685 
00686     HT_INFOF("DROP TABLE '%s' id=%d success", table_name_str.c_str(), ival);
00687     cb->response_ok();
00688     cout << flush;
00689 
00690   }
00691   catch (Exception &e) {
00692     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00693     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00694   }
00695 }
00696 
00697   void Master::shutdown(ResponseCallback *cb) {
00698     RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30000);
00699 
00700     HT_INFO("SHUTDOWN");
00701     std::cout << endl;
00702 
00703     {
00704       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00705       boost::xtime expire_time;
00706 
00707       // issue shutdown commands
00708       for (ServerMap::iterator iter = m_server_map.begin();
00709            iter != m_server_map.end(); ++iter)
00710         rsc.shutdown((*iter).second->addr);
00711 
00712       boost::xtime_get(&expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00713       expire_time.sec += (int64_t)30;
00714 
00715       m_no_servers_cond.timed_wait(lock, expire_time);
00716       if (!m_server_map.empty()) {
00717         String err_msg = format("%d RangeServers failed to shutdown",
00718                                 (int)m_server_map.size());
00719         cb->error(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, err_msg);
00720         return;
00721       }
00722 
00723       m_hyperspace_ptr = 0;
00724     }
00725 
00726     cb->response_ok();
00727 
00728     poll(0, 0, 1000);
00729 
00730     _exit(0);
00731 
00732   }
00733 
00734 
00735 void
00736 Master::create_table(const char *tablename, const char *schemastr) {
00737   String finalschema = "";
00738   String tablefile = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + tablename;
00739   string table_basedir;
00740   string agdir;
00741   Schema *schema = 0;
00742   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00743   uint64_t handle;
00744   uint32_t table_id;
00745 
00749   if (m_hyperspace_ptr->exists(tablefile))
00750     HT_THROW(Error::MASTER_TABLE_EXISTS, tablename);
00751 
00755   schema = Schema::new_instance(schemastr, strlen(schemastr));
00756   if (!schema->is_valid())
00757     HT_THROW(Error::MASTER_BAD_SCHEMA, schema->get_error_string());
00758 
00759   schema->assign_ids();
00760   schema->render(finalschema);
00761   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"schema:\n"<< finalschema << HT_END;
00762 
00766   handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(tablefile,
00767       OPEN_FLAG_READ|OPEN_FLAG_WRITE|OPEN_FLAG_CREATE, null_handle_callback);
00768 
00773   {
00774     char numbuf[16];
00775     if (!strcmp(tablename, "METADATA")) {
00776       table_id = 0;
00777       sprintf(numbuf, "%u", table_id);
00778       cout << "table id = " << numbuf << endl;
00779     }
00780     else {
00781       table_id = (uint32_t)atomic_inc_return(&m_last_table_id);
00782       sprintf(numbuf, "%u", table_id);
00783       cout << "table id = " << numbuf << endl;
00784       m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id",
00785                                  numbuf, strlen(numbuf)+1);
00786     }
00787 
00788     m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(handle, "table_id", numbuf, strlen(numbuf)+1);
00789   }
00790 
00794   m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(handle, "schema", finalschema.c_str(),
00795                              finalschema.length());
00796 
00797   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00798 
00803   table_basedir = (string)"/hypertable/tables/" + tablename + "/";
00804 
00805   foreach(const Schema::AccessGroup *ag, schema->get_access_groups()) {
00806     agdir = table_basedir + ag->name;
00807     m_dfs_client->mkdirs(agdir);
00808   }
00809 
00813   if (table_id != 0) {
00814     TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00815     KeySpec key;
00816     String metadata_key_str;
00817     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00818     int max_wait=5;
00819 
00820     while (!m_metadata_table_ptr && max_wait) {
00821       poll(0, 0, 1000);
00822       max_wait--;
00823     }
00824 
00825     if (!m_metadata_table_ptr)
00826       HT_THROW(Error::MASTER_NO_RANGESERVERS,
00827                "Aborting DropTable because no RangeServers have registered");
00828 
00829     mutator_ptr = m_metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00830 
00831     metadata_key_str = String("") + table_id + ":" + Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00832     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00833     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00834     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00835     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00836 
00837     key.column_family = "StartRow";
00838     mutator_ptr->set(key, 0, 0);
00839     mutator_ptr->flush();
00840 
00845     TableIdentifier table;
00846     RangeSpec range;
00847     uint64_t soft_limit;
00848     RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30000);
00849 
00850     table.name = tablename;
00851     table.id = table_id;
00852     table.generation = schema->get_generation();
00853 
00854     range.start_row = 0;
00855     range.end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00856 
00857     {
00858       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00859       if (m_server_map_iter == m_server_map.end())
00860         m_server_map_iter = m_server_map.begin();
00861       assert(m_server_map_iter != m_server_map.end());
00862       memcpy(&addr, &((*m_server_map_iter).second->addr),
00863              sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00864       HT_INFOF("Assigning first range %s[%s:%s] to %s", table.name,
00865           range.start_row, range.end_row, (*m_server_map_iter).first.c_str());
00866       ++m_server_map_iter;
00867       soft_limit = m_max_range_bytes / std::min(64, (int)m_server_map.size()*2);
00868     }
00869 
00870     try {
00871       RangeState range_state;
00872       range_state.soft_limit = soft_limit;
00873       rsc.load_range(addr, table, range, 0, range_state);
00874     }
00875     catch (Exception &e) {
00876       String err_msg = format("Problem issuing 'load range' command for "
00877           "%s[..%s] at server %s - %s", table.name, range.end_row,
00878           InetAddr::format(addr).c_str(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00879       HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, err_msg);
00880     }
00881   }
00882 
00883   if (m_verbose) {
00884     HT_INFOF("Successfully created table '%s' ID=%d", tablename, table_id);
00885   }
00886 
00887 }
00888 
00889 
00894 bool Master::initialize() {
00895   uint64_t handle;
00896   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00897 
00898   try {
00899 
00900     if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->exists("/hypertable")) {
00901       if (!create_hyperspace_dir("/hypertable"))
00902         return false;
00903     }
00904 
00905     if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->exists("/hypertable/servers")) {
00906       if (!create_hyperspace_dir("/hypertable/servers"))
00907         return false;
00908     }
00909 
00910     if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->exists("/hypertable/tables")) {
00911       if (!create_hyperspace_dir("/hypertable/tables"))
00912         return false;
00913     }
00914 
00915     // Create /hypertable/master if necessary
00916     handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/master",
00917         OPEN_FLAG_READ|OPEN_FLAG_WRITE|OPEN_FLAG_CREATE, null_handle_callback);
00918     m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00919 
00923     handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/root",
00924         OPEN_FLAG_READ|OPEN_FLAG_WRITE|OPEN_FLAG_CREATE, null_handle_callback);
00925     m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00926 
00927     HT_INFO("Successfully Initialized Hypertable.");
00928 
00929     return true;
00930 
00931   }
00932   catch (Exception &e) {
00933     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00934     return false;
00935   }
00936 }
00937 
00938 
00942 void Master::scan_servers_directory() {
00943   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00944   HandleCallbackPtr lock_file_handler;
00945   std::vector<struct DirEntry> listing;
00946   uint32_t lock_status;
00947   LockSequencer lock_sequencer;
00948   RangeServerStatePtr rs_state;
00949   uint32_t oflags;
00950   String hsfname;
00951 
00952   try {
00953 
00957     m_servers_dir_callback_ptr =
00958         new ServersDirectoryHandler(this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00959 
00960     m_servers_dir_handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/servers",
00961         OPEN_FLAG_READ, m_servers_dir_callback_ptr);
00962 
00963     m_hyperspace_ptr->readdir(m_servers_dir_handle, listing);
00964 
00965     oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00966 
00967     for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++) {
00968 
00969       rs_state = new RangeServerState();
00970       rs_state->location = listing[i].name;
00971 
00972       hsfname = (String)"/hypertable/servers/" + listing[i].name;
00973 
00974       lock_file_handler =
00975           new ServerLockFileHandler(rs_state, this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00976 
00977       rs_state->hyperspace_handle =
00978           m_hyperspace_ptr->open(hsfname, oflags, lock_file_handler);
00979 
00980       m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(rs_state->hyperspace_handle,
00981           LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lock_status, &lock_sequencer);
00982 
00983       if (lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00984         HT_INFOF("Obtained lock on servers file %s, removing...",
00985                  hsfname.c_str());
00986         m_hyperspace_ptr->close(rs_state->hyperspace_handle);
00987         m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(hsfname);
00988       }
00989       else {
00990         m_server_map[rs_state->location] = rs_state;
00991       }
00992     }
00993   }
00994   catch (Exception &e) {
00995     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00996     HT_ABORT;
00997   }
00998 }
00999 
01000 
01004 bool Master::create_hyperspace_dir(const String &dir) {
01005 
01006   try {
01007 
01008     if (m_hyperspace_ptr->exists(dir))
01009       return true;
01010 
01011     m_hyperspace_ptr->mkdir(dir);
01012 
01013   }
01014   catch (Exception &e) {
01015     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Problem creating hyperspace directory '" << dir << "'"
01016         << HT_END;
01017     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
01018     return false;
01019   }
01020 
01021   return true;
01022 }
01023 
01024 void Master::join() {
01025   m_app_queue_ptr->join();
01026   m_threads.join_all();
01027 }
01028 
01029   void Master::wait_for_initialization() {
01030     ScopedLock lock(m_initialization_mutex);
01031     while (!m_initialized) {
01032       HT_WARN("Waiting for initialization ...");
01033       m_initialization_cond.wait(lock);
01034     }
01035   }
